properties.title: Publications that cover Apache MyFaces Trinidad

section.name: Publications that cover Apache MyFaces Trinidad
Books
section.p:
The following books are covering Apache MyFaces Trinidad:
Apache MyFaces Trinidad 1.2: A Practical Guide (by David Thomas)
The Definitive Guide to Apache MyFaces and Facelets (by Zubin Wadia, Martin Marinschek, Hazem Saleh, Dennis Byrne, Mario Ivankovits, Cagatay Civici, Arvid Huelsebus, Detlef Bartetzko, Bruno Aranda, Allan Lykke Christense)

section.name: Articles
section.p:
The following articles are covering Apache MyFaces Trinidad:
Apache Trinidad - A World Cup Skinning Experience? (by Jonas Jacobi)

body.p: If the above list of available publications is insufficient, please send e-mail to the users mailing list.
